title: Modern Waterfront Villa
description: Experience luxury living in this stunning modern waterfront villa. Featuring expansive glass walls, a private infinity pool, and direct ocean access. The open-concept design blends indoor and outdoor living seamlessly, perfect for entertaining or relaxing in style.

title: Urban Penthouse Suite
description: A sophisticated penthouse in the heart of the city with breathtaking skyline views. This residence offers high ceilings, premium finishes, and a private terrace. Located steps away from world-class dining and entertainment.

title: Cozy Countryside Cottage
description: Escape to the quiet charm of the countryside in this beautifully renovated cottage. Surrounded by mature trees and gardens, it features a warm fireplace, hardwood floors, and a spacious backyard for outdoor activities.

title: Contemporary Family Home
description: A sleek and stylish contemporary home designed for modern family living. Highlights include a gourmet kitchen, a dedicated home office, and a master suite with a spa-like bathroom. Conveniently located near top-rated schools.

title: Luxury Beachfront Condo
description: Wake up to the sound of waves in this exclusive beachfront condo. Features floor-to-ceiling windows, a designer kitchen, and access to resort-style amenities including a pool and gym. The ultimate coastal retreat.

title: Historic Townhouse
description: A charming historic townhouse with preserved architectural details and modern updates. Boasts original brickwork, high ceilings, and a private courtyard. Located in a vibrant neighborhood with shops and cafes.
